articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Floral Basket to Cuban Embassy Here
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Floral Basket to Cuban Embassy Here
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent a floral basket to the Cuban Embassy here on the 59th anniversary of the victory of the Cuban revolution.
					 The floral basket was conveyed to the Cuban ambassador to the DPRK by an official concerned on Friday.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Cuban Embassy
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Cuban Embassy
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The International Affairs Department of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the Ministry of External Economic Relations of the DPRK and the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries sent floral baskets to the Cuban Embassy here on the 59th anniversary of the victory of the Cuban revolution.
					 The baskets of flowers were conveyed to the Cuban ambassador on Friday.

articles.title: Officials Meet to Review Their Work for Implementing 5-Year Strategy
articles.content:
Officials Meet to Review Their Work for Implementing 5-Year Strategy
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- There took place a joint conference of officials of the Party, state, economy and armed forces organs in Pyongyang on December 28 to review this year's work for implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development.
					 Present there were Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, Pak Yong Sik, O Su Yong, An Jong Su, Ro Tu Chol, Choe Hwi, Pak Thae Dok and Ri Man Gon and officials of the party and armed forces organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and officials of local party and power organs and major industrial establishments.
					
					 The joint conference analyzed and reviewed the successes and defects in this year's work for carrying out the tasks, set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address, and the five-year strategy for national economic development.
					
					 Park Pong Ju in his report recalled that the Supreme Leader in his New Year Address advanced the tasks for accelerating the victorious advance of socialism with the great spirit of self-reliance and self-development as the dynamic force and brought about great national auspicious events, especially significant events, one after another.
					
					 The reporter referred to the proud achievements the army and people of the DPRK made through an all-out campaign in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development to attain the goals for this year set by the Party.
					
					 All the successes made in this year's drive are a brilliant fruition of the respected Supreme Leader's distinguished and sagacious guidance, he added.
					
					 After analyzing the defects and lessons in this year's work, the reporter stressed the need to victoriously attain the goals of the five-year strategy for national economic development set forth by the Party.
					
					 Then officials in different sectors of the national economy took the floor.

articles.title: Celebration Performance of Workers
articles.content:
Celebration Performance of Workers
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Art Group of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) gave a performance at the Central Hall of Workers Friday to celebrate the sixth anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Among the audience were Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the GFTUK Central Committee, trade union officials and members and workers.
					
					 The performance began with chorus "Glory to General Kim Jong Un".
					
					 Extending glory and congratulations to the Supreme Leader, the performers sang of the happiness and joy of the Korean army and people blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation.
					
					 They also represented numbers making the audience recall the devoted efforts of the peerlessly illustrious commander who increased the might of the KPA in every way and ushered in a new heyday of bolstering the military capability.
					
					 And they showed the stamina of the heroic Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il working class working fresh miracles and innovations in the building of a powerful and prosperous country.

articles.title: Celebration Meetings of Working People's Organizations
articles.content:
Celebration Meetings of Working People's Organizations
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Meetings of youth and students and agricultural workers took place at the Central Youth Hall and the Jangchon Vegetable Cooperative Farm on Friday to celebrate the sixth anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Present at the meetings were officials concerned and officials of the youth league and the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea.
					
					 Reporters and speakers at the meetings said that the six years after Kim Jong Un's assumption of the KPA supreme commandership were a proud course in which the dignity and national strength of Juche Korea have been fully displayed all over the world under his guidance.
					
					 They noted that at the historic turn of succession to the revolutionary cause of Juche he set it as the general objective for army building to model the entire army on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and developed the KPA into a reliable scouting party and strong support of the revolution firmly guaranteeing the Party's cause with arms.
					
					 His assumption of KPA supreme commandership is a historic event of great significance in the steady development of the Korean revolutionary armed forces and the cause of Juche revolution, they said.
					
					 They stressed the need to fully display the invincible might of socialist Korea, rallied closer around the Party Central Committee headed by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Participants in WPK Cell Chairpersons' Conference Tour Pyongyang
articles.content:
Participants in WPK Cell Chairpersons' Conference Tour Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 5th Conference of Cell Chairpersons of the Workers' Party of Korea visited various places in Pyongyang.
					 They visited the Youth Movement Museum, where they recollected the exploits the great leaders and the WPK performed by building a great youth power while going round various rooms.
					
					 At the Fatherland Liberation War Historic Site they looked round the various parts associated with the exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by leading the war to a victory.
					
					 They also toured the Sci-Tech Complex, the Central Class Education House and the Korean People's Army Museum of Weapons and Equipment.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued to Commemorate Successful Test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued to Commemorate Successful Test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea issued new stamps (four sheets and one individual) to commemorate the successful test-fire of new-type ICBM Hwasong-15.
					 Seen in the centre of a sheet depicting the flags of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK is a photo of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un guiding the test-fire on the spot.
					
					 Printed in another sheet is a picture of the Supreme Leader giving an autographic order for the test-fire, with a statement of the DPRK government announcing the accomplishment of the historic cause of completing the state nuclear force, the cause of building a rocket power.
					
					 Other sheets and an individual stamp show the Hwasong-15 soaring into the sky, its altitude flight, flight hours and landing point and the 9-axis self-propelled launcher manufactured by the Korean working class.
					
					 Seen in upper parts of the stamps are letters reading "Accomplishment of the historic cause of completing the state nuclear force" and "Successful test-launch of new-type ICBM Hwasong-15".

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Muhammadu Buhari, president and commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces of the Federal Republic of Nigeria, on the occasion of the New Year Juche 107 (2018).
					 The charge d'affaires ad interim of the Nigerian embassy here conveyed the floral basket to an official concerned on Friday.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councilors corps here presented a floral basket and congratulatory letter to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the sixth anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the New Year Juche 107 (2018).
					 Pavel Leshakov, councilor of the Russian embassy who is doyen of the corps, conveyed them to an official concerned on Friday.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a basket of flowers and a congratulatory letter from the Military Attaches Corps here on the occasion of the New Year Juche 107 (2018).
					 The basket and letter were conveyed to Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Russian Military Attache Alexei Bartusov, doyen of the corps, on Friday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Chinese
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Chinese
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from the family of Zhang Wei-hua, a Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, on Friday on the occasion of the sixth anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the New Year Juche 107 (2018).

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Suk from Swiss Body
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Suk from Swiss Body
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the 100th Birth Anniversary of Mother Kim Jong Suk presented a gift to the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk on the occasion of the centenary of her birth.
					 The gift was conveyed to an official of the DPRK Embassy in Switzerland by Chairman Martin Lotscher on Dec. 23.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Construction of Samjiyon County
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Construction of Samjiyon County
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea is pushing forward the work to spruce up Samjiyon County.
					 Samjiyon County is a historic land where President Kim Il Sung led the anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory and leader Kim Jong Il was born as the Shining Star of Mt Paektu.
					
					 According to a person concerned, officials and shock brigade members of the 216 Division, builders from the ministries, national institutions and provincial people's committees and soldier-builders have conducted the construction in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development despite all difficulties and hardships.
					
					 Officials, scientists and researchers of various units, including the Revolutionary Relics Administration Guidance Bureau, Kim Il Sung University and the Songyong Electric Light Decoration Institute, made sure that the statue of Kim Il Sung at the shore of Lake Samji and the statue of Kim Jong Il in Samjiyon Town are standing on the highest level.
					
					 Soldier-builders of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces completed the project for repairing stone stairs of Lake Chon on Mt Paektu and exterior projects of 10-odd objects including Hyangdo and Paektu railway stations.
					
					 Samjiyon Youth Railway Station, Samjiyonmotka Railway Station and other structures have been built to suit the features of mountainous area, and the project for Hyesan-Samjiyon broad-gauge railway is near to completion.
					
					 The Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Study Hall of Samjiyon County has been remodeled as a model of the country. The frame project for the Paektusan Museum was completed and Samjiyon Town Hotel and the Samjiyon Town General Shop built.
					
					 The Samjiyon Potato Farina Production Factory with potato farina production buildings, potato storage, auxiliary building and workers' hostel was built in a brief span of time.        
					
					 Builders, scientists and researchers installed 100-kilowatt solar panels and wind-driven generators on the top of Pegae Hill to create 400-kilowatt wind and solar generating capacity.
					
					 They carried out the project for laying optical fibre cable to finish tele-communications infrastructure for giving tele-education and sci-tech data service to farms, industrial establishments, schools, field of the preservation of revolutionary relics and many other units of the county. 
					
					 Builders made blocks and finishing building materials with pumice and larch abundant in the county to ensure the formative art of structures on a high level. They are also stepping up the construction of dwelling houses in the county down.
					
					 The DPRK plans to turn Samjiyon County into a grand open-air museum for education in revolutionary traditions, model and iconic county of mountainous cities, model unit in potato farming and a model which takes the lead in realizing the comprehensive mechanization of rural economy and a place to be envied by the people the world over.

articles.title: Successes Made in Mushroom Production
articles.content:
Successes Made in Mushroom Production
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea is pushing forward the drive to put the mushroom production on a scientific and industrial basis, true to the intention of the Workers' Party of Korea to turn the country into a huge producer of mushroom.
					 The technology for cultivating pleurotus based on rice straw fermentation has been developed by scientists and researchers of Kim Il Sung University, the State Academy of Sciences and the Central Mushroom Institute of the Ministry of Agriculture.
					
					 After analyzing the physiochemical composition of rice straw and the biological characteristic of pleurotus, they settled sci-tech issues arising in the substrate fermentation, spore cultivation and cultivation of mushroom before putting pleurotus cultivation on an industrial basis.
					
					 They also manufactured rice straw cutter, sterilizer and other energy-saving equipment for mushroom production.
					
					 New species of mushroom have been bred and the wastes of mushroom production recycled.

articles.title: DPRK Will Invariably Keep Line of Simultaneously Developing Two Fronts: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Invariably Keep Line of Simultaneously Developing Two Fronts: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article that this year is one in which the DPRK has demonstrated its dignity as a world-level military power.
					 Today the army and people of the DPRK fully realize once again that only when they dynamically advance along the road of socialism while invariably holding fast to the Party's line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of a nuclear force, can they smash the enemies' desperate challenges and win the final victory in the showdown with the U.S. imperialists, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Some days ago, the U.S. cooked up another UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" to retrieve its shameful defeat, by finding fault with the DPRK's test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15.
					
					 It is foolish for it to attempt to break the will of the army and people of the DPRK and check the advance of Juche Korea with such illegal "resolution on sanctions".
					
					 It is very ridiculous that the U.S. is mulling depriving the DPRK of its strategic position and nuclear deterrence that guarantee peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 This should be clearly understood by the U.S. and its vassal forces and neighboring countries following its criminal policy without dignity.
					
					 It is a poor excuse and self-deception for them to advertise that the denuclearization on the Korean Peninsula is the goal and sanctions are needed for it and only doing so would prevent a war.
					
					 Neighboring countries only watch the countdown of a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula, but the DPRK is doing what it wants with courage, foreseeing the victory in accomplishing the great cause of national reunification and the human cause of independence.
					
					 Nothing can break the steadfast will of Juche Korea to staunchly advance along the road of socialism, invariably holding fast to the Party's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Forces Branded as Aggressors and Provokers
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Forces Branded as Aggressors and Provokers
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Now the danger of a nuclear war is extremely increasing on the Korean Peninsula owing to the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces' desperate moves to militarily stifle the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a commentary.
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The U.S. has cooked up heinous "sanctions resolutions" at the United Nations by branding the DPRK's self-defensive measures for bolstering the nuclear deterrence as "grave provocation and threat". Furthermore, it openly cried out for "military option" and has made desperate efforts to put it into practice.
					
					 A nuclear war has been prevented in the Korean peninsula thanks to the powerful self-defensive nuclear deterrence of the DPRK, even though the U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail against it reached the extreme phase.
					
					 Meanwhile, the south Korean puppet forces persistently resorted to the military provocation in collusion with the U.S., viciously taking issue with the DPRK's legitimate steps for bolstering the nuclear deterrence and thus driving the situation of the Korean Peninsula to the worst phase in which a nuclear war may break out any time.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces are aggressors and provokers disturbing peace and security of the Korean Peninsula and the region and bringing disaster of a nuclear war to the nation.
					
					 With nothing they can cover up their nature as criminals resorting to the war games in the nuclear arsenal while trampling down upon the aspiration and wishes of the nation for improved north-south relations, peace and national reunification.

articles.title: U.S. Can Not Stop Advance of DPRK: Minju Joson
articles.content:
U.S. Can Not Stop Advance of DPRK: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The U.S. cooked up another "sanctions resolution" 2397 against the DPRK on Dec. 23 by threatening and bribing the UNSC member nations.
					 In this regard, Minju Joson Friday says in a commentary that the U.S. attempt to browbeat the DPRK through such sanctions is no more than a last-ditch effort of those on the death bed.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The more pressure is put on the DPRK, the more courageously it rises up, and herein lies the basic key to achieving the best success in the worst adversity.
					
					 The DPRK is a full-fledged nuclear power of Juche and a world-level military power. It is no longer a weak country which has to exist tamely, subject to the sanctions and pressure by the U.S.
					
					 It will decisively react to the U.S. moves to stifle it as it has had access to nuclear deterrent for self-defense in order to defend the sovereignty, dignity and right to existence.
					
					 As we are confident that the road to the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts precisely means the one to independence and victory, we will keep to its road, regardless of whatever others may say and whatever approaches of the U.S. to the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to bear in mind that no force can prevent Juche Korea from making a dynamic advance along the road illuminated by the great idea.

articles.title: Minju Joson Calls for Forcing Die-hard Conservative Judges to Leave Office
articles.content:
Minju Joson Calls for Forcing Die-hard Conservative Judges to Leave Office
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- In south Korea the die-hard conservative judges such as Sin Kwang Ryol, O Min Sok and Kang Pu Yong set free former Defense Minister Kim Kwan Jin and former policy room chief Im Kwan Bin who had been detained as key manipulators behind the case of misleading the public opinion of the puppet Cyber Command, thereby putting the prosecution investigation that went close to traitor Lee Myung Bak into chaos. They also turned down the warrants of arrest for former foreign strategy secretary of Chongwadae Kim Thae Hyo, a close confidant of traitor Lee, and also for former secretary general of the Oboi Association Chu Son Hui who waged pro-"government" demonstration after being financed by the Intelligence Service under Lee's rule on the pretext of "special operation" and for former MBC director general Kim Jae Chol who played a key role in the Lee group's moves of putting broadcasting under its control.
					 A commentary of Minju Joson Friday denounces this as an open ignorance and outright challenge to the candlelight demonstrators demanding the abolition of evils of the puppet conservative regimes.
					
					 It is clear that if those die-hard conservative judges in alignment with the puppet conservative forces are left intact, there can be such tragic consequences by which the demand of south Koreans of all social standings for abolition of evils become empty echo and the results of the candlelight demonstrations are undermined, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The south Koreans from all walks of life should not stop their struggle until the evils, root cause of all social wrongdoings, are thoroughly abolished but force those die-hard conservative judges acting a waiting maid for the conservative group to leave their office.
					
					 The People's mindset represents the will of Heaven and those going against the mindset are bound to be punished by Heaven. Anyone going against the mindset of the candlelight demonstrators will have to face a stern punishment of history.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Intervention in 2012 Election Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Intervention in 2012 Election Disclosed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Former puppet Defense Minister Kim Kwan Jin of south Korea was reportedly disclosed to have intervened in the April, 2012, parliamentary election by directly commanding the Cyber Command of the puppet army.
					 The defense ministry document titled "strategy to counter the north's cyber psychological warfare toward the south", declassified on Dec. 27, exposed that the ministry carried out the tactical proposal comprising five phases such as "rallying and protecting the right-wing forces" and "interception of black propaganda".
					
					 It instructed the army cyber command to sustain in posting about 190 pieces misleading the public on an internet website for one month until the election date under the pretext of initiative tactical operation.
					
					 This gave the lie to the assertion of the Lee Myung Bak group that "it had not intervened in election".

articles.title: U.S. Attempt for Invading DPRK Accused by S. Koreans
articles.content:
U.S. Attempt for Invading DPRK Accused by S. Koreans
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- More than 5,000 people from all walks of life in south Korea, including members of the "Reunification Righteous Volunteers Ushering in Fresh Centenary", reportedly held the "2017 meeting for peace on the Korean Peninsula" at the plaza of Kwanghwamun in Seoul on December 23.
					 The participants in a "peace declaration" denounced the U.S. for mobilizing the latest weapons while crying out for preemptive attack on the north.
					
					 Standing against any military action, they called for an end to the division of the Korean Peninsula and establishment of a durable peace-keeping mechanism.

articles.title: "Underhand Agreement" on Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army Disclosed
articles.content:
"Underhand Agreement" on Sexual Slavery for Imperial Japanese Army Disclosed
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Yonhap News of south Korea on December 27 disclosed that the "underhand agreement" on sexual slavery for the imperial Japanese army was reached with Japan, which was more humiliating than the "one" the Park Geun Hye regime signed in 2015.
					 It was revealed when the "agreement" was reviewed as part of the campaign to eradicate the deep-seated evils of the conservatives. 
					
					 The report on the review of the "agreement" disclosed that the U.S. intervened in the "agreement" as the worsening relations between south Korea and Japan were a burden on the U.S. strategy of Asia-Pacific domination.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Respecting the Forerunners of the Revolution Is a Noble Moral Obligation of Revolutionaries" was brought out in booklet by the Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on Dec. 18 to mark the 26th anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 6th anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the KPA supreme commandership.
					 The work, published on Dec. 25, Juche 84 (1995), deals with the idea that to respect the forerunners of the revolution is the requirement of the revolution. It also clarifies the principled problems arising in establishing the moral trait of respecting the revolutionary forerunners and developing the relationship based on the noble sense of moral obligation among people.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Commemorated Abroad
Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings took place in Pakistan, Nepal and Indonesia from Dec. 5 to 16 on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise.
					 The secretary general of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association and other speakers said that HE Kim Jong Il has been profoundly revered by the progressive mankind, praising his feats for the prosperity of the country, the global peace and security and the human cause of independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association stressed that leader Kim Jong Il carried forward the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung and turned the DPRK into a socialist country where the Juche idea is thoroughly embodied and a powerful country where the single-minded unity of the leader, the Party and the masses is realized.
					
					 Messages to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events in Pakistan and Nepal.

articles.title: Russian Body Rejects "Sanctions Resolution" against DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Body Rejects "Sanctions Resolution" against DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The Moscow Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Russia released a statement on Dec. 25 over the fact that the UN Security Council adopted the "sanctions resolution" 2397, taking issue with the DPRK over its successful test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The imperialists are desperately moving to totally destroy the DPRK, a socialist state where the people are the masters of society, but that will never happen.
					
					 The Korean people, firmly united around respected Comrade Kim Jong Un and the Workers' Party of Korea, will defend socialism they established with their blood and sweat at any cost.
					
					 We fully support the Korean people's just struggle.
					
					 All members of our group strongly censure the "sanctions resolution" aimed to stifle socialist Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia cesto de flores a la embajada cubana
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia cesto de flores a la embajada cubana
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un envio un cesto de flores a la embajada de la Republica de Cuba en Corea en ocasion del 59o aniversario del triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana.
					Un funcionario coreano lo traslado el dia 29 al embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario del pais caribeno.

articles.title: Varios organos de Corea envian cestos de flores a la embajada cubana
articles.content:
Varios organos de Corea envian cestos de flores a la embajada cubana
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 59o aniversario del triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana, el Departamento Internacional del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores, el Ministerio de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero y el Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, enviaron los cestos de flores a la Embajada de la Republica de Cuba en la RPDC.
					Los cestos fueron traslados el dia 29 al embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario del pais caribeno.

articles.title: Sesionada reunion de funcionarios de partido, Estado, economia y fuerzas armadas
articles.content:
Sesionada reunion de funcionarios de partido, Estado, economia y fuerzas armadas
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 28 en esta capital la reunion conjunta de los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, el Estado, la economia y las fuerzas armadas para hacer balance de los trabajos del ano 2017 destinados a cumplir la Estrategia Quinquenal para el desarrollo de la economia nacional.
					En la ocasion tomaron parte Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Yong Sik, O Su Yong, An Jong Su, Ro Tu Chol, Choe Hwi, Pak Thae Dok, Ri Man Gon y los funcionarios del partido, fuerzas armadas, el Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales y de las instituciones locales del partido y el poder, las fabricas y empresas importantes.
					
					Los participantes analizaron y balancearon los exitos y los errores ocurridos en los trabajos del ano 2017 para cumplir las tareas presentadas por el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un en su Mensaje del Ano Nuevo y la estrategia quinquenal arriba mencionada.
					
					En el informe Pak Pong Ju dijo que en su Mensaje del Ano Nuevo el Maximo Dirigente presento las tareas para acelerar el avance victorioso del socialismo teniendo como fuerza motriz el principio de autofortalecimiento y propicio grandes acontecimientos jubilosos de importancia historica para la nacion.
					
					Enumero los exitos orgullosos alcanzados por nuestro ejercito y pueblo quienes bajo la direccion del partido, libraron una intensa campana de creacion en el principio de autofortalecimiento para alcanzar a toda costa las metas de este ano, presentadas por el partido.
					
					Esos exitos son productos de la destacada y probada guia del Maximo Dirigente, apunto.
					
					Analizo algunos defectos observados en los trabajos de este ano y las lecciones correspondientes y llamo a alcanzar con victoria las metas de la Estrategia Quinquenal para el desarrollo de la economia nacional, presentada por el partido.
					
					Acto seguido, hubo intervenciones por cada sector de la economia nacional.

articles.title: Grupo artistico de FGSC ofrece funcion de festejo
articles.content:
Grupo artistico de FGSC ofrece funcion de festejo
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 29 en la Casa Central de Obreros la funcion del grupo de propaganda artistica del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea (FGSC), dedicada al 6o aniversario de nombramiento del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					La disfrutaron el presidente del CC de la FGSC, Ju Yong Gil y otros funcionarios de la FGSC, los obreros y los miembros de esta entidad sindical.
					
					En la escena iniciada por el coro "Gloria al General Kim Jong Un", se pusieron el trio femenino "Estamos felices en el regazo del Dirigente", el solo masculino "Mi patria que defiendo" y otras piezas.
					
					Rindiendo la gloria y la felicitacion al Maximo Dirigente, los ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico la emocion y jubilo del ejercito y pueblo coreanos que gozan de las fortunas de contar de generacion en generacion con el Lider, el General y el Comandante Supremo.
					
					Ademas, en la escena se pusieron las piezas que hacen recordar los esfuerzos del Maximo Dirigente quien centuplico el poderio del EPC y abrio nueva era dorada de la intensificacion de las fuerzas militares. 
					
					Se ofrecieron otras obras que describen el impetu firme de la heroica clase obrera de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il que crean nuevos milagros e innovaciones en la construccion de la patria prospera.

articles.title: Organizaciones de masas celebran efemeride coreana
articles.content:
Organizaciones de masas celebran efemeride coreana
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 6o aniversario del nombramiento del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un como Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tuvieron lugar el dia 29 en la Casa Central de la Juventud y la Granja Cooperativa Especializada en Verduras de Jangchon del capitalino municipio de Sadong los actos de celebracion de los jovenes y estudiantes, trabajadores agricolas y los miembros de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea.
					  En las ocasiones estuvieron presentes los funcionarios interesados, los funcionarios de la Union de la Juventud y la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea, los jovenes y estudiantes, los trabajadores agricolas y los miembros de la UTAC.
					
					  En los actos, los oradores subrayaron que los 6 anos pasados que el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un dirigio la revolucion coreana asumiendo el cargo importante del Comandante Supremo del EPC, son la trayectoria orgullosa en que fueron demostrados a todo el mundo la dignidad y el poderio nacional de la Corea del Juche.
					
					  Se refirieron a que en el periodo historico de la sucesion de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, el Maximo Dirigente aclaro la identificacion de todo el ejercito con el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo como deber general de la construccion del ejercito y lo desarrollo como patrulla y punto de apoyo fidedignos de la revolucion que defiende firmemente la causa del Partido.
					
					  Indicaron que el nombramiento del Maximo Dirigente como Comandante Supremo del EPC es el evento historico que tiene una importante significacion en el desarrollo incesante de las fuerzas armadas de la revolucion coreana y el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					  Finalizaron destacando que todos deben unir mas compactamente en torno al CC del PTC encabezado por el Maximo Dirigente y demostrar sin reserva el invencible poderio de la Corea socialista.

articles.title: Emitidos nuevos sellos dedicados al exitoso lanzamiento de "Hwasong-15"
articles.content:
Emitidos nuevos sellos dedicados al exitoso lanzamiento de "Hwasong-15"
Pyongyang, 29 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En conmemoracion del exitoso lanzamiento de prueba del nuevo ICBM "Hwasong-15", la Direccion Estatal de Sellos de Corea dio a luz nuevos sellos (4 papeles enterizos de pequeno tamano y un sello).
					En la parte central del papel enterizo, que conlleva las banderas del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y de la RPDC, se ve la foto del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un dirigiendo en el terreno el disparo experimental de "Hwasong-15".
					
					Otro papel con la imagen de el dando el 28 de noviembre de este ano la orden firmada de puno y letra sobre la ejecucion de lanzamiento se lee la declaracion del gobierno de la RPDC, publicada para anunciar el cumplimiento de la historica causa de completar las fuerzas armadas nucleares y convertir el pais en una potencia coheteril.
					
					Estan dibujados en otros papeles y sello individual el cohete en el curso de ascension, su maxima altura, distancia y tiempo de navegacion, el punto de impacto y el camion autopropulsado de 9 jefes con plataforma de lanzamiento, fabricado por la clase obrera coreana.
					
					En la parte arriba de ellos se leen estas frases: "Cumplimiento de la historica causa de perfeccionamiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado" y "Exito total de lanzamiento de prueba del ICBM 'Hwasong-15' de nuevo tipo".
